author: DenIS318
changes: Salute is now correctly displayed as non-mime

author: DenIS318
changes: PDA no longer lose charge when in recharger (no infinity charging)
Replaces most game font usages to MS Serif to fix cyrillic issues
Eyelids now shown even if blinking is disabled
Localized all basic emotions (some alien emotions/in emote panel and so on might still be not localized)
Emotes in emote panel localized
Emotes now can use nouns based on gender
Nova's Emotes+ panel disalbed (still can use /Me for it)
Nova's Silicon emotes disabled (still can use /Me for it)

author: DenIS318
changes: Basic Health Analyzer is now default at medbay equipment technode (spawn in med techfab) from start
Taser mode is now available at advanced energy gun
Max Size of species reduced 1.5 -> 1.2. This includes settings in editor and quirks. Admins can still set it higher manually.
Oversized quirk size reduced 2.0 -> 1.5
Handgun holster is added to detective closet
Now if species doesnt have custom basic emotes sounds, then it use human sounds
Free flip for everyone. No longer requires any traits to be done without delay

author: FlufflesTheDog
changes: Fix missing opfor/ghost/respawn buttons on the escape menu.

author: OrionTheFox
changes: fixed RPED icons disappearing when applying upgrades (they now use TG's updated icons)

author: DenIS318
changes: Justice mech code & icons moved to modular. So now it can be constructed again
Fixed errors related to justice that arise due to removal justice from TG
Dynamic admin panel height increased in tabs that are not rulesets from 400 to 500
ID computer login fixed errors on Nova's security levels (such as Orange and so on)
Now once casing left from gun that had custom projectile damage modifier, it's combat information displays info relative to previous gun. Also shows for normal modifier as well

author: DenIS318
changes: cargo ui plasmacost is shown at express console interface & pda intreface
Round Timer no longer start with something like 23:55:00... Instead from 00:00:00
Round Timer no longer jumps back to 00:00:00 once round start, round timer is calculated since start of server
Actual Round Timer is removed from status display, since Round Timer is actually "actual" now
Progressive Dynamic is reworked and added back

Progressive Dynamic now increase current dynamic tier level once certain amount of threat, based on how much non-antag alive security/heads/crew alive the same way, as it was before. Simple: if nothing happens for long (especially the longer shift) and you have alive security, dynamic level could be raised
Once dynamic level is raised by progressive dynamic, a report is sent to communications console and announced
New progressive dynamic UI added to Dynamic Panel

author: DenIS318
changes: Singulo no longer invisible
Whisper and italics text now properly shown in runechat
Reworked and fixed dynamic tweaks for new dynamic, including restricted species (mainly for changelings)
Minimal enemies (security/captain/blueshield/consultant) is added back to new dynamic
Set minimal enemies to similar values as it was before, but based on dynamic tier
Head of Staff (non-mindshield like Captain, Consultant) can now really become antags

author: DenIS318
changes: Man Up response for a-tickets
Revert "Removes the Justice mech (TG #92486)"
Revert "NT/E "Laevateinn" - a magnetic .38 revolver (Nova №5947)"

Max Health is reduced from 135 to 100 (so now in soft crit you can sustain up to 200 damage before falling to hard crit, instead of 270). However keep in mind, that health is tied to bodyparts damage, so it's not always exactly 100 health for softcrit, with 100 brute damage there might be "5" health, instead of 0. TL;DR One extra hit almost always would be be required.

author: DenIS318
changes: Adminwho for non-admins players no longer shows no-admins info, when there are admins
Added sprite to toy turret kit for request console (instead of ERROR)
Fixed double-equip outfit items for ghost role spawners

author: DenIS318
changes: Disabled automatic light flickering (from explosions and other stuff). Should result in better perfomance
Disable autotransfer vote when there's no players

author: Arceniu
changes: Upgraded blueshield medkit to fix synth
fixed some lost blueshield edits
blueshield now have 1984 modularity instead of offs code edit
fixed a some runtimes in DS2/IP/PT job accounts
returned jackets to ds2

author: DenIS318
changes: Removed NIFsoft default examine text ("There's a certain spark to their eyes."). You need to set it manually if you want it to appear (more than 6 characters)
Now transfer vote properly count non-voters as "Continue playing" as other votes does
Dynamic no longer counts non-station roles as "Alive" for rulesets population
Dynamic rolling no longer counts SSD/disconnected players as "Alive"

Example how Dynamic count alive players now: 1 secoff, 1 disconnected crew, 1 SSD crew, 2 normal crew, 1 dead crew, and 1 non-station role (tarkon) = 3 alive players, antags normally start from 5 population (including 1 security/captain). The same principes applying to "enemies" selection, such when calculating amount of alive security/heads (for revs)
Alive Players in dynamic panel now shows how much it count as "Alive" for rolling (no ghost roles... etc.). This might differ from other admin panels (it's should be that way)

Plasma inflation now works for ghostroles markets same way, as it does for station cargo. Interdyne and DS-2 market are shared. Total 5 markets: station, interdyne+ds, tarkon, pirates, "blackmarket" (when it doesn't fit any of others)
Plasma inflation is calculated during predict value on ghostroles pads (can view how much you will get from plasma before sending it)
Mutadone pills added to NanoDrug
Atmos techs now start with engineering skillchip
Syndicate research server is added to DS-2. It's have it's own techweb separated from station. Interdyne is also gain researches from it (in case they build R&D)
Spare Syndicate R&D server circuit added to DS-2 vault safe
Ghostroles such as Tarkon, DS-2, Interdyne no longer have destination to station docks
Tarkon instead of station can fly to Deep Space by using camera console (in case it was spawned)
Tarkon remote now can fly to any custom location and back to tarkon port (unique feature for tarkon shuttle only)

author: DenIS318
changes: Health analyzer (basic) is added to autolathe designs
Added 2 more atmos MODsuits storage units to all recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Tram, Icebox). Now it's 3 in total.
Replaced almost all empty defibs on all maps/templates with initially loaded defibs
Loaded defibs at maps now properly shows attached defib overlay
Disable unathi from roundstart races. Use lizardperson instead
Added 3 Ion Jetpack modules to engivend's premium with cost 400 per each
Ion Jetpack module is now auto-pinned on insert to pre-equipped MODsuits (not for fully hand-crafted MODs)
Delta is now considered as "default" map during map-votes (matters if someone doesn't vote at all and don't have prefered map selected)
When there's no votes at all during transfer vote, always "Continue Playing" is selected (so it won't auto-transfer when there's no players at all)
Transfer vote now normally accesible to players only at periods: between 15-40 minutes of round, after 90 minutes of round
If any admin use toggle vote for transfer vote at least once, this will disable automatic toggle behaviour (15-40-90 minutes thresholds)
Deleted unused client verbs, such as: "Link Forum Account", "Show Map Vote Tallies" (we don't use them at all)

author: DenIS318
changes: Huds no longer can change status from inside of bitrunning domains. Some other functional is limited as well from bitrunning.

author: DenIS318
changes: Security officers now are assigned per department (Science, Engineering, Medical, Cargo, Service)
Security department preference in character preferences
Service Security Officer. He doesn't have it's own post and start at brig
Max amount of sec offs increased accordingly (7 => 12) to fit departments
Corrections Officer now have security sunglasses (with HUD), instead of normal sunglasses
Security Officer's assigned to department start at their posts
Replaced department's guard lockers with security officer lockers
Department guards removed (Orderly, Bouncer, Customs Agent, Engineering Guard, Medical Guard)

author: DenIS318
changes: Reconnect after server restart most likely should always work now
Admin revive now heals scarring eyes
Colored PDA manifest
Now shows physical status in crew manifest, according to medical records such as Active/Deceased
Departments are colored in PDA manifest
Crew manifest no longer contains any silicons (they are NOT crew)
Crew manifest no longer contains any "Central Command" (blueshield, consultant, and other such are placed in "Command")

changes: Security Voucher supply crate's amount 4 => 3
Prison cell timers no longer says "NO DATA" and doesn't display admin-observer names

Dormitory vendor (CozyMate) no longer spawn on permabrig
Prisoners no longer spawn with any loadout, only with outfit
Prisoner is now colored at NTTC radio
Prisoner processing console UI height 500 => 540
SS1984 changes are now hightlighted in changelogs

changes: Fixed issues with broken say messages + no radio on machinery

author: Arceniu
changes: Added new vendor-with sleep suits and bedsheets
NTR trim now have CentcomBlue color big pointer

author: DenIS318
changes: Revert: Removed 'His Grace' from the Traitor uplink. It was a chaplain traitor only item that required you to consume 25 player corpses to ascend, making you inmune to stuns, regen life and putting you in a timer to kill as many people possible. (upstream #5777)
Bridge Officer no longer available to station
Added safe to HOS office with unica-6 in it with 3 speedloaders + holster for all recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)
Added safe codes to HOS office for all recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)

author: DenIS318
changes: Engineering Secure Storage button is added to all recommended maps (delta, meta, icebox, tram)
Revert: making detective role more unique, by removing crew pinpointer and detective scanner from their closets, preventing abuse this by officer's. (upstream #4464)
Detective scanner is added to HOS closet
Armory access no longer required to open security MOD room, now it's brig access. For all supported maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)
Added oxygen canister to armory on recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)
Modular computers (PDA) now shows message when shutdown by powerloss
Modular computers (PDA) powerloss now triggering itself when cell charge's ends
Russian human female lastnames generation

author: DenIS318
changes: Plasma inflation mechanic for cargo. TL;DR: the more plasma you send rapidly, the less it worth.
Plasma sells at cargo now calculate new prices & revenue by curve similar to Log2(x)
Plasma price recovers in 15 mins (if there's no sells, if there's any plasma cell - timer stops and start again, but from current price)
Current plasma cost is displayed at cargo console UI
Plasma inflation works only for cargo shuttle, no away ghots roles/pirates
More detailed description & formulas & graphs are attached in pull request Excel file
Example: 50 plasma worth ~3200 credits, before worth 4000. And 1000 plasma (sold rapidly) worth ~8000 credits, before worth 80000
All simplemobs stamina slowdown reduced 3 => 2, except spiders
For spiders, flesh spiders stamina slowdown reduced 12 => 1
Hunter slug damage multiplier for compatible targets 5=>4, base damage still 20
Hunter Slugs no longer deals damage twice to compatible targets
Kiboko grenades projectiles speed increased 0.5 => 0.9 (normal projectile speed is 1.25)
NTTC at telecomms no longer works if machine is depowered/broken/EMP (comms blackout count as EMP)
SSD players no longer get considered for antag role in midround dynamic rulesets
Map vote now highlight recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Tram, Icebox) - these maps have up-to-date mapping
Highlighted options in vote displayed at top

author: DenIS318
changes: Dynamic rulesets now should correctly work based on enemies per threat, most rulesets require at least 1 enemy (security/captain)
Agent card "select all" and "deselect all" buttons now should correctly work
All midround antag rulesets except sentient disease and borers now require at least 1 enemy (security/heads) for lowpop. Some rulesets require more than 1.

Midround antags rulesets now require at least 5 players, for which they didn't required already. This includes: Syndicate Sleeper, Obsessed. And relevant latejoins. If you want such antagonists at all - you need at least 1 security (captain would fit as well)
Changes for minimum players for other rulesets, such as nuclear assault, wizard, etc...
Quiet ruleset now cost 0.1 threat instead of 0.00001...
Abandoned crates no longer can be hacked using screwdriver-multitool-wirecutter
Now you can see/set security notes/status and other records on yourself if you have relevant HUD.
Now can correctly set status/some other HUD related actions during softcrit
Now during changing security status with SecHUD comment can be added. Automatically adds all such actions it to crime history
revert Nova's Max message length 2048 -> 1024 (as it is in TG)
Added handgun shoulder holster, works similar as MOD Shoulder Holster, but attaches to suit
Added hotkey for attachable shoulder holster (H by default)
Shoulder holster is added to all security weapon kits (hybrid taser kit, sol pistol...)
Shoulder holster added to biogenerator craft for 200 biomaterial
